comment.caption: Mary Jane Truman standing in an asparagus patch
comment.note: One of a series of photos from Mary Jane Truman's Christmas Album, 1906. Mary Jane Truman (far left) and several unidentified women standing in an asparagus patch at the Grandview farm. Caption says "In the Asparagus." From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, daughter of Vivian Truman.
